panels.description:

Docs: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/monitoring-usage



User Prompt: input prompt content and its length

API Requests: Model, token consumption and cost

Tool Decision: accept / reject by (Source)

Tool: Parameters, result size, error, and use_id

targets.expr: _msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) count() as requests
_msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) sum(cost_usd) as requests
_msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) sum(input_tokens) as requests
_msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) sum(output_tokens) as requests
_msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) sum(cache_read_tokens) as requests
_msg:claude_code.api_request session.id:"$session" | stats by (model) sum(cache_creation_tokens) as requests
_msg:claude_code.tool_result session.id:"$session" | stats by (tool_name) count() as requests
_msg:claude_code.tool_result session.id:"$session" | stats by (decision_type) count() as requests
